answers.answer: Have they checked for gestational diabetes? That can be accompanied with a lot of those symptoms as well. I wish I had some advice for You other than hang in there bc it will all be worth it in the end. I hope you start feeling better soon. Good luck!! :-)

question: Being a first time mom and having a few complications like gaining a lot of weight I started at 145 and now 233 and than my feet being extremely swollen and my hands that when I close them they feel like they're dislocating. And they have been checking me constantly go preeclampsia But that has been fine. But I have all the signs the weight gain the extremely bad head aches the fluid and now yesterday my blood pressure yesterday was 151/91 they're worried about it but still feel they're doing nothing. I'm 33 weeks but have been measuring 4 weeks ahead both with an ultrasound and the doctor measuring my stomach I'm also dilated to 1 cm. So they say they believe I will go early..but I'm so uncomfortable and now today I feel my blood pressure has only gone up more. Should I worry or just wait until my next appointment I feel I bug them enough with other things they're just sick of me..I just need to vent
title: What should I do?
